title: SOLD: T207 blank back Otto Knabe...

posts.post_title: SOLD: T207 blank back Otto Knabe...
posts.post_content:
For sale is a blank back T207 Otto Knabe.  There are 2 for sale on ebay for over $900 apiece, but I guess you get ebay bucks, so there's that.

Price is $SOLD postpaid in the continental U.S.

Commitment to purchase takes precedent over ongoing negotiations.  ;)

Email me at [url]seablaster@yahoo.com[/url] if interested.
